page.title: 06EPSOM MARKETS
page.content: {Epsom holds 2 markets,}the older outdoor market (founded in 1685) and the new indoor market.{The outdoor {market}is situated down the centre of the High Street by the Clock Tower. {The indoor market}is inside the market hall, also on th High Street. {The outdoor market}is owned by the council and is open only on Saturdays. Stalls can be rented for between Â£10 and Â£20, although there is a long waiting list, and most sell fruit and vegetables. {The indoor market}is privately run and rents vary from Â£20 to Â£144 depending on the size of the stall. Most things can be found in the indoor market.
